comment._content: I'll state confidently that Sady is the pug's name, and that she belonged to Anne Lloyd of Traverston House, Tipperary. I state it confidently because although it is nothing but a wild guess, I don't think anyone can disprove it, as Traverston house is long gone! Ha ha ha!
